title: Philly Bike Roundup: Show bikes from Amigo, Bender, Bilenky, Bishop, Blaze & Chapman
content:
The 2021 Philly Bike Expo was a bit of a homecoming for many brands, and after a year off from shows, a welcome return to something resembling normalcy. And there was no shortage of beautiful bikes from a lot of builders. Our coverage thus far has been of the components and small parts, so these

The post Philly Bike Roundup: Show bikes from Amigo, Bender, Bilenky, Bishop, Blaze & Chapman appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
